SELECT DISTINCT A.TAKESEQ, TO_CHAR(RECEIPTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RECEIPTDATE, D.CUSTOMER_AUTONO, REPAIR_ENUM(C.TAKESEQ) REPAIR_NAME, D.CUSTOMER_ID, D.CUSTOMER_NAME, D.CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND, D.CUSTOMER_TEL, FN_CODENAME(POSITION,'AUTO_ROOM') POSITION, ETIME, TASKSTAT, FN_CODENAME(TASKSTAT,'AUTO_PROC') TASKSTAT_NM, FN_CODENAME(C.REPAIRMETHOD,'AUTO_ME') REPAIRMETHOD FROM CAR_LEAD_REPAIR A, CAR_LEADTIME B, CAR_TAKEREPAIR C, CAR_CUSTOMER D WHERE a.REPAIRCODE = b.CODE AND a.TAKESEQ = c.TAKESEQ AND c.CUSTOMER_ID = d.CUSTOMER_ID AND c.TASKSTAT IN('CB-standby', 'CB-perfect') AND b.H_CODE = NVL('',b.H_CODE) AND b.CODE = NVL('',b.CODE) AND c.POSITION = NVL('',c.POSITION)
AND b.H_CODE LIKE '%'||#{PIDX}||'%' AND b.CODE LIKE '%'||#{PIDX1}||'%'
AND b.H_CODE LIKE '%'||#{PIDX}||'%'
AND POSITION LIKE '%' ||UPPER(#{POSITION})|| '%'
AND C.RECEIPTDATE BETWEEN #{sdate} AND #{edate} AND C.RECEIPTDATE >= #{sdate}
ORDER BY RECEIPTDATE DESC
